named-query.name: StatusLkEntity.BY_NAME
named-query.query: From StatusLkEntity slks where slks.name = :name and slks.softDelete = :softDelete

named-query.name: BusRuleHitEntity.BY_RULE_ID
named-query.query: From BusRuleHitEntity br where br.busRule.busRulePk = :bizRuleId and br.softDelete = :softDelete

named-query.name: BusRulePropertyEntity.BY_RULE_ID
named-query.query: From BusRulePropertyEntity brp where brp.busRuleFk = :bizRuleId and brp.softDelete = :softDelete

named-query.name: BusRulePriorityEntity.BY_RULE_ID
named-query.query: From BusRulePriorityEntity brp where brp.busRule.busRulePk = :bizRuleId and brp.softDelete = :softDelete

named-query.name: OrderDetailEntity.BY_OMS_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: From OrderDetailEntity od where od.omsOrderId = :omsOrderId and od.softDelete = :softDelete order by od.createdDate desc

named-query.name: UserMasterEntity.BY_USER_NAME
named-query.query: From UserMasterEntity um where um.username = :userName and um.softDelete = :softDelete

named-query.name: BusRuleEntity.BY_FILE_NAME_AND_DESC
named-query.query: From BusRuleEntity br where br.ruleFileName = :ruleFileName and br.ruleDescription = :ruleDescription and br.softDelete = :softDelete
